cf.BoundedVariable.isauxiliary¶

BoundedVariable.isauxiliary¶

True if the variable is an auxiliary coordinate object.

See also

isdimension, isdomainancillary, isfieldancillary, ismeasure

Examples: 
>>> f.isauxiliary
False
